flexibleContent.heading: We at Techtic use the precise blend of technology, innovation, and talent of our teams to deliver the optimal Offshore Software Development Services to our clients.

contentLists.heading: Offshore Dedicated Team Model
contentLists.content: With our Dedicated Team Model, you can establish an extension to your internal software development team with us ensuring a high level of transparency and trust.

contentLists.heading: Cooperation Models In Offshore Software Development
contentLists.content: We work with different corporation models starting from Dedicated development, Time and Material approach, Fixed price, and Hybrid model to ensure flexibility to our clients.

contentLists.heading: Choosing the Precise Technology Specialists in Offshore Software Development
contentLists.content: Our Clients can choose the best resource and hire them for offshore development models using technical/non technical interviews, tests and trials.

contentLists.heading: Onshore Software Development
contentLists.content: If required we work on an onshore model for our clients to ensure that they have access to the best talent of pool on their premises.

contentLists.heading: What is offshore development?
contentLists.content: Offshoring means procuring services or products for operations with a base exterior to one’s nation.

contentLists.heading: Why Should I Outsource or Offshore My IT Operations?
contentLists.content: The prime reason for outsourcing or offshoring your company’s IT operations is cost-effectiveness when you hire offshore developers. Outsourcing will assist you in saving your organization’s funds in the form of not having to employ supplementary staff members. It will not even upsurge the hours your staff members are working and not purchase new software services or tools with every step of project progression.

contentLists.heading: What are the steps to offshore software development?
contentLists.content:
Here are the five steps to enable Offshore Software Development Services for your company.

  • Step 1: Identify the offshore development services requirements
  • Step 2: Comprehend the technology behind your business requirements
  • Step 3: Find the precise offshore software development company
  • Step 4: Have interactions on your needs with the development center
  • Step 5:Request for a quote, finalize the project needs and outsource

contentLists.heading: What are the core gains when you hire offshore developers?
contentLists.content:
The benefits of hiring offshore development specialists include

  • Saving of time, extra efforts, and higher in-house resource costs
  • Get access to cost-effective infrastructure and systems
  • Access to the newest technologies and expertise
  • Boost efficiency, productivity, and have reduced risks
  • Get staffing agility and more work flexibility

contentLists.heading: How can I track the advancements of my hired team members?
contentLists.content: We provide our clients complete flexibility to deal with and track their hired team members with modern-day tools. Our team members send regular work progress reports, and they even take up stand-up meetings wherein the client’s stakeholders can participate in monitoring the project progress.

contentLists.heading: What will be the scenario if I have challenges managing a hired development professional?
contentLists.content: If you face any performance problems with our offshore developers, you can raise the issue with the project manager. Our project manager will check and execute a gap analysis, and he will further spot the challenges and resolve them same. However, if the issues continue with a particular developer, we will replace that developer.
